name: Ant-Man
description: Scott Lang becomes the size-changing superhero Ant-Man, armed with a suit that allows him to shrink in size.

name: Wasp
description: Hope van Dyne, daughter of Hank Pym, becomes the superhero Wasp, equipped with a suit that grants her the ability to shrink and fly.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: Wanda Maximoff, also known as Scarlet Witch, possesses incredible reality-altering powers.

name: Quicksilver
description: Pietro Maximoff, also known as Quicksilver, possesses superhuman speed, making him one of the fastest beings on Earth.
